General.Name: Tianjin You Fa Steel Pipe Group Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianjin You Fa Steel Pipe Group Stock Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of steel pipes in China. It offers straight seam welded pipes, hot-dip galvanized steel pipes, square rectangular steel pipes, hot-dip galvanized square rectangular steel pipes, plastic-lined composite steel pipes, plastic-coated composite steel pipes, spiral welded pipes, stainless steel pipes, and buckle scaffolding under the Youfa and Zhengjinyuan brands. The company exports its products to approximately 100 countries and regions, such as North America, South America, Africa, Europe, Oceania, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia. Tianjin You Fa Steel Pipe Group Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is based in Tianjin, China.
General.Address: No. 1 Huanhu South Road, Tianjin, China, 301606
